entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
